remarks.slideshowName: The OneDrive filename of the file that will be downloaded.
remarks.slideshowSender: The email address of the account that own's the specified OneDrive file.
remarks.powerpointPath: The path to your PowerPoint executable. Make sure you escape backslashes with another backslash.
remarks.email: The account that will be used to download the OneDrive item. The item must be directly shared with this account.
remarks.password: The password to the account specified above.
remarks.updateCheckInterval: The time in ms to wait between checking for updates to the file. If an update was detected, the process will exit after running the command specified by updateTriggerCommand.
remarks.updateTriggerCommand: The command to run after an update was detected but JUST before the process exits. I recommend this to be your batch file that starts the slideshow.
remarks.showPuppeteerWindow: Debug option. Enabling this will show the emulated browser window that is used to get the Microsoft Graph authentication token.
